long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Multi Webhook Sender: Your Ultimate Data Sharing Companion
Multi Webhook Sender is a powerful Chrome extension designed to supercharge your workflow by enabling seamless sharing of web content to multiple services through webhooks. Whether you're a developer, researcher, content creator, or automation enthusiast, this extension is your all-in-one solution for effortless data transfer.
ğŸŒŸ Key Features:

ğŸ”— Multiple Webhook Support: Configure and manage multiple webhooks from various services all in one place.
ğŸ“Š Flexible Data Sending: Send selected text, URLs, images, and clipboard content directly to your configured webhooks.
ğŸ–±ï¸ Context Menu Integration: Right-click on selected text or anywhere on a page to quickly send data to your chosen webhook.
ğŸ”§ Custom Data Fields: Add and customize key-value pairs to send along with your primary data, allowing for rich, structured information sharing.
ğŸ‘ï¸ User-Friendly Interface: Easily manage your webhooks through an intuitive popup interface.
ğŸ’¾ Auto-Save Functionality: Your webhook configurations are automatically saved as you type, ensuring you never lose your settings.
ğŸ“¢ Triple Notification System:

Badge notification on the extension icon
In-browser notification
System notification (if enabled on your system)


ğŸ“‹ Clipboard Access: Send clipboard data directly to webhooks, expanding your data sharing capabilities.
ğŸ› ï¸ "Fix Issues" Button: Quickly resolve any problems you might encounter when sending webhook data.
ğŸ”’ Privacy-Focused: All your webhook configurations are stored locally in your browser.

ğŸ¤– Automation Workflows:

Trigger IFTTT applets or Zapier zaps with web data.
Automatically log data to Google Sheets for personal or business analytics.
Send web content directly to your personal knowledge management system.
Trigger home automation actions based on web content (e.g., stock prices, weather data).



ğŸ”§ How It Works:

Configure your webhooks in the extension popup.
Select text on any web page, copy content to your clipboard, or use custom key-value pairs.
Right-click and choose your desired webhook from the context menu, or send directly from the popup.
The selected, copied, or custom content is instantly sent to your configured webhook.

ğŸ†˜ Need Help?
Encountering issues? No worries! Just click the "Fix Issues" button in the extension popup. This handy feature is designed to resolve common problems you might face when sending webhook data.

Multi Webhook Sender is designed with privacy and security in mind. All your webhook configurations are stored locally in your browser, and the extension only accesses the content you explicitly choose to send.
Boost your productivity, streamline your workflows, and unlock the power of automation with Multi Webhook Sender. Say goodbye to copying and pasting across multiple tabs and hello to effortless, instantaneous data sharing!
